verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in the <S%H2022>hills,<s%> and in the <S%H8219>valleys,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2348>coasts<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> thereof;

That they gathered <S%H6908>themselves<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6310>accord.<s%>

And when the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and to <S%H5857>Ai,<s%>

They <S%H1992><s%> did <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H6195>wilily,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> and made as if they had been <S%H6737>ambassadors,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1087>old<s%> <S%H8242>sacks<s%> upon their <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H4997>bottles,<s%> <S%H1087>old,<s%> and <S%H1234>rent,<s%> and bound <S%H6887>up;<s%>

And <S%H1087>old<s%> <S%H5275>shoes<s%> and <S%H2921>clouted<s%> upon their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H1087>old<s%> <S%H8008>garments<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them; and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of their <S%H6718>provision<s%> was <S%H3001>dry<s%> and <S%H5350>moldy.<s%>

And they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> We be <S%H935>come<s%> from a far <S%H4480>country:<s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H7350><s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore <S%H3772>make<s%> ye a <S%H1285>league<s%> with us.

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> <S%H194>Peradventure<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> us; and <S%H349>how<s%> shall we <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>league<s%> with you?

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H587>We<s%> are thy <S%H5650>servants.<s%> And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H4310>Who<s%> are <S%H859>ye?<s%> and from <S%H4480>whence<s%> <S%H370><s%> <S%H935>come<s%> ye?

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, From a very far <S%H4480>country<s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H7350><s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> because of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8089>fame<s%> of him, and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and to <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was at <S%H6252>Ashtaroth.<s%>

Wherefore our <S%H2205>elders<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of our <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> us, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H6720>victuals<s%> with <S%H3027>you<s%> for the <S%H1870>journey,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them, and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H587>We<s%> are your <S%H5650>servants:<s%> therefore <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3772>make<s%> ye a <S%H1285>league<s%> with us.

This <S%H2088><s%> our <S%H3899>bread<s%> we took <S%H2525>hot<s%> for our <S%H6679>provision<s%> out of our <S%H4480>houses<s%> <S%H1004><s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> we came <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you; but <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H3001>dry,<s%> and it <S%H1961>is<s%> moldy: <S%H5350><s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4997>bottles<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H4390>filled,<s%> were <S%H2319>new;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they be <S%H1234>rent:<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> our <S%H8008>garments<s%> and our <S%H5275>shoes<s%> are become <S%H1086>old<s%> by reason of the <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H4480>long<s%> <S%H7230><s%> <S%H1870>journey.<s%>
And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> of their <S%H4480>victuals,<s%> <S%H6718><s%> and <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> counsel at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with them, and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1285>league<s%> with them, to let them <S%H2421>live:<s%> and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto them.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H834><s%> they had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>league<s%> with them, that they <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were <S%H413>their<s%> <S%H7138>neighbors,<s%> and that <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> their <S%H5892>cities<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> Now their <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> and <S%H3716>Chephirah,<s%> and <S%H881>Beeroth,<s%> and <S%H7157>Kirjath-jearim.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> them <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto them by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5387>princes.<s%>

But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H587>We<s%> have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto them by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore we <S%H3201>may<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> them.

This <S%H2063><s%> we will <S%H6213>do<s%> to them; we will even let them <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us, because <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto them.

And the <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Let them <S%H2421>live;<s%> but let them <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2404>hewers<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> had <S%H1696>promised<s%> them.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for them, and he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> have ye <S%H7411>beguiled<s%> us, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H587>We<s%> are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> you; when <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> us?

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H859>ye<s%> are <S%H779>cursed,<s%> and there shall <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> you be <S%H3772>freed<s%> from being <S%H5650>bondmen,<s%> and <S%H2404>hewers<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God.<s%>

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> it was certainly <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H5046><s%> thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H853><s%> how <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, therefore we were <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of our <S%H5315>lives<s%> because <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> we are in thine <S%H3027>hand:<s%> as it seemeth <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> unto <S%H5869>thee<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> unto us, <S%H6213>do.<s%>

And <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> he unto them, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H2026>slew<s%> them <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2404>hewers<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> and for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he should <S%H977>choose.<s%>
